prompt: Create a forgot password screen with a futuristic dark theme and a black background (Colors.black). Use a Column layout with crossAxisAlignment.center and a max width of 400. Display a 'Reset Your Password' title in neon blue (Colors.cyan[400]), font size 28, and bold. Add a subtitle in light gray (Colors.grey[400]) saying 'Enter your email to receive a reset link.' Include a TextField with a neon blue border (Colors.cyan[400]), hint text 'Email', and a prefix icon (Icons.email) in cyan. Add a full-width ElevatedButton with a neon blue background (Colors.cyan[500]), white text 'Send Link', and rounded corners (borderRadius: 10.0). Below, place a TextButton with 'Back to Login' in cyan. Use padding of 24.0 and space elements with SizedBox(height: 18.0).
